p: Cellular viability was measured using the MTT assay according to Marques et al. ( 21). Macrophages RAW 264.7 and L929 fibroblast cells were incubated for 24 h in the presence or absence of VOB from 1–1000 µg/mL concentration. Experiments were carried out at least in triplicate and results are reported as percentage of viable cells.
